• Integrates with the keyless entry system—no need for an additional remote
• Automatic rearming, door-ajar warning, interior light activation, panic alarm, rolling code technology and disabling of the starter
• Includes glass breakage sensor (GBS) with a highly sensitive microphone that detects the sound frequency of an object striking on glass or glass breakage
• Alarm activates when someone tries to force open a door or glass is broken 1001153.1000851.1000862.1000881.title=RS3200+ Vehicle Security System [installed_msrp] 1001153.1002622.1000867.1003048.title=RS3200 + Vehicle Security System 1001153.1000851.1000868.1000997.source=NVS 1001153.1002622.1000868.1001008.package=false 1001153.1002622.1000868.1000998.specialexteriorcolorflag=false 1001153.1002622.1000867.1000979.source=NVS 1001153.1002622.1000863.1000930.title=Vehicle Intrusion Protection (VIP) Security System [installed_msrp] 1001153.1000851.1000867.1000966.description=When it comes to security, the RS3200+ vehicle security system is the ideal addition:
•Designed to integrate with the keyless entry system - no need for an additional remote
•Automatic rearming and relocking, door-ajar warning, interior light activation, panic alarm, rolling code technology and disabling of the starter
•Warn-away alarm is triggered if an object strikes a window
•Alarm is activated if someone tries to force open a door or if glass is broken

Available only for vehicles equipped with factory remote keyless entry. 1001153.1000851.1000868.1000999.description=When it comes to security, the RS3200+ vehicle security system is the ideal addition:
•Designed to integrate with the keyless entry system - no need for an additional remote
•Automatic rearming and relocking, door-ajar warning, interior light activation, panic alarm, rolling code technology and disabling of the starter
•Glass breakage sensor (GBS) includes a highly sensitive microphone that detects the sound frequency of an object striking on glass or glass breakage
•Warn-away alarm triggers an alarm if an object strikes a window
•Alarm is activated if someone tries to force open a door or if glass is broken

But they’re just gonna have to get their own. Protect your Tacoma with a security system and sleep easier.
• Designed to integrate with the keyless entry system—no need for an additional remote
• Alarm functions:
o Panic alarm remotely triggers vehicle’s alarm when activated from key fob
o Warn-away alarm triggers if an object striking a window is detected
o Break-in alarm is activated if forced entry of a side door is attempted or if glass is broken
• Other features:
o Door ajar warning helps remind driver to lock vehicle
o Remote arming and disarming
o Automatic rearming and relocking
o Interior light activates when vehicle is unlocked with key fob
o Rolling code technology changes the remote code, helping prevent code theft
o Starter disabled when system is activated
• Includes glass breakage sensor (GBS):
o Highly sensitive microphone detects the specific sound frequency of striking on glass or glass breakage
o Sounds alarm and disarms starter if a window is broken
o Sounds a warn-away alarm if object striking a window is detected

• Designed to integrate with the keyless entry system—no need for an additional remote
• Alarm functions:
o Panic alarm remotely triggers vehicle’s alarm when activated from key fob
o Warn-away alarm triggers if an object striking a window is detected
o Break-in alarm is activated if forced entry of a side door is attempted or if glass is broken
• Other features:
o Door ajar warning helps remind driver to lock vehicle
o Remote arming and disarming
o Automatic rearming and relocking
o Interior light activates when vehicle is unlocked with key fob
o Rolling code technology changes the remote code, helping prevent code theft
o Starter disabled when system is activated
• Includes glass breakage sensor (GBS):
o Highly sensitive microphone detects the specific sound frequency of striking on glass or glass breakage
o Sounds alarm and disarms starter if a window is broken
o Sounds a warn-away alarm if object striking a window is detected

o Panic alarm remotely triggers vehicle’s alarm when activated from key fob

o Door ajar warning helps remind driver to lock vehicle
o Remote arming and disarming
o Automatic rearming and relocking

o Rolling code technology changes the remote code, helping prevent code theft
o Starter disabled when system is activated
• Includes glass breakage sensor (GBS):
o Highly sensitive microphone detects the specific sound frequency of striking on glass or glass breakage

o Sounds a warn-away alarm if object striking a window is detected

• Alarm functions:
o Panic alarm remotely triggers vehicle’s alarm when activated from key fob
o Warn-away alarm triggers if an object striking a window is detected

o Interior light activates when vehicle is unlocked with key fob
o Rolling code technology changes the remote code, helping prevent code theft
o Starter disabled when system is activated

o Highly sensitive microphone detects the specific sound frequency of striking on glass or glass breakage
o Sounds alarm and disarms starter if a window is broken
o Sounds a warn-away alarm if object striking a window is detected

But they’re just gonna have to get their own. Protect your Tacoma with a security system and sleep easier.
• Designed to integrate with the keyless entry system—no need for an additional remote
• Alarm functions:
o Panic alarm remotely triggers vehicle’s alarm when activated from key fob
o Warn-away alarm triggers if an object striking a window is detected
o Break-in alarm is activated if forced entry of a side door is attempted or if glass is broken
• Other features:
o Door ajar warning helps remind driver to lock vehicle
o Remote arming and disarming
o Automatic rearming and relocking
o Interior light activates when vehicle is unlocked with key fob
o Rolling code technology changes the remote code, helping prevent code theft
o Starter disabled when system is activated
• Includes glass breakage sensor (GBS):
o Highly sensitive microphone detects the specific sound frequency of striking on glass or glass breakage
o Sounds alarm and disarms starter if a window is broken
o Sounds a warn-away alarm if object striking a window is detected

• Designed to integrate with the keyless entry system—no need for an additional remote
• Alarm functions:
o Panic alarm remotely triggers vehicle’s alarm when activated from key fob
o Warn-away alarm triggers if an object striking a window is detected
o Break-in alarm is activated if forced entry of a side door is attempted or if glass is broken
• Other features:
o Door ajar warning helps remind driver to lock vehicle
o Remote arming and disarming
o Automatic rearming and relocking
o Interior light activates when vehicle is unlocked with key fob
o Rolling code technology changes the remote code, helping prevent code theft
o Starter disabled when system is activated
• Includes glass breakage sensor (GBS):
o Highly sensitive microphone detects the specific sound frequency of striking on glass or glass breakage
o Sounds alarm and disarms starter if a window is broken
o Sounds a warn-away alarm if object striking a window is detected
